item.description:
This group is for hikers who haven't given up on their love of hiking and being in nature despite their age or level of physical conditioning. We hike at a pace 50% slower than the AMC Trailguide book time. There are three other hiking Meetup groups if you want a faster pace or more challenging hikes (The New England Hiking Meetup, 4 Seasons Hiking Group, New England Over 40 Hiking Group). Our goal is to stay fit while enjoying the camaraderie of hikers who have similar skills and goals. This is a dog free hiking group.

Trailhead: Take I93 north to exit 32,take the Kancamagus Highway(NH 112) east past Bear Notch Road to Champney Falls Parking lot on the right side of the road.We will hike the Champney Falls Trail to the summit of Mt.Chocorua (3475').The summit is rocky and open with 360 degree views. 7.6 miles round trip, 2250' elevation gain, AMC booktime 5 hours, 8 hours estimated time for our group.---Steve & Cindy---- Disclaimer: As a condition of your voluntary participation in this activity you acknowledge and agree to the following: this activity involves inherent risks that can cause property damage, injury, illness, disability, and/or death to participants and/or others; you assume all risk associated with this activity; you are responsible for having the necessary knowledge, skills, abilities, clothing, and equipment to safely participate in this activity; you know and will follow the Hiker Responsibility Code described at www.hikesafe.com; the leader(s) of this activity are volunteers; and you release, hold harmless, and indemnify the leader(s) and all members of this group from any and all claims for property damage, injury, illness, disability, and/or death - including those caused by negligence and/or other reasons.
item.how_to_find_us: Black Colorado pick up truck NH2431202
item.name: MODERATE/STRENUOUS HIKE - MT.CHOCORUA
